name: JF-310 Orange Juice
details:
Orange RB Amp SImThe Orange Juice Amp Simulator re-creates the in your face sound of some great British Amps, influencing Punk, Classic Rock. Every sound that requires a dirty sound with some attitude will find a friend in the Orange Juice Pedal. Whether you use it direct into your sound interface or in front of your amp.
Controls:
Tone
Gain / Drive
Mid Boost /Voice
Volume
Specifications:
True By Pass
Amp Simulator
Input Impedance: 1m
Output Impedance: 10k
Running Current: 25mA
Power: DC 9V negative polarity adapter, not supplied.
Dimensions:
7.3cm long
4.3cm wide
5 cm tall.
Weight : 220g
https://www.joyoaudio.co.uk/JF-310-orange-juice
